instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan high speed.
threads.message: Another day with another mess, <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> 2015 board with 1.6 cpu, visual inspection, 1.6 cpu was changed 1.8 another shop, now fan high speed and also before cpu change was liquid damage. tryed, trackpad, another io and flex. nothing changed, i changed <CHIP>U5810</CHIP> also, no changes. Where to start and what u think ? Board turns on, and its slow also.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan high speed.
threads.message:
Did you try disconnecting webcam?
Any error pops up starting in diagnostic mode?
